resources.string: Rowena enters, an air of mystique surrounding her, her dark attire hinting at otherworldly pacts, a faint aura of eldritch energy trailing in her wake.

string-array.name: player_rowena
string-array.item: A tankard as sturdy as your resolve. May it provide a moment\'s respite from the battles of the day.
Strong ale for a sturdy warrior. Just make sure it doesn\'t charge into battle on its own!
A warrior seeking a drink as robust as his armor. Maybe my company could add a different kind of strength?
